LD R1, #0(R0)
LD R2, #1(R0)
ADDI R3, R0, #32
MOVE R7, R2
ANDI R7, R7, #1
SLI R7, R7 #1
OR R7, R7, R6
BZ R7, #10
SUBI R7, R7, #1
BZ R7, #5
SUBI R7, R7, #1
BZ R7, #5
SUBI R7, R7, #1
BZ R7, #4
ADD R4, R4, R1
BR #2
SUB R4, R4, R1
MOVE R7, R4
ANDI R7, R7, #1
SLI R7, R7, #31
MOVE R6, R2
ANDI R6, R6, #1
SRLI R2, R2, #1
OR R2, R2, R7
SRAI R4, R4, #1
SUBI R3, R3, #1
BPL R3, #-23
MOVE R15, R2
HALT


######################################


010010 00000 00001 0000000000000000     # LD R1, #0(R0)
010010 00000 00010 0000000000000001     # LD R2, #1(R0)
000001 00000 00011 0000000000100000     # ADDI R3, R0, #32
010001 00000 00111 0000000000000010     # MOVE R7, R2
000100 00111 00111 0000000000000001     # ANDI R7, R7, #1
001001 00111 00111 0000000000000001     # SLI R7, R7, #1
000000 00111 00110 00111 000000 0 0101  # OR R7, R7, R6
110011 00111 00000 0000000000001010     # BZ R7, #10
000010 00111 00111 0000000000000001     # SUBI R7, R7, #1
110011 00111 00000 0000000000000101     # BZ R7, #5
000010 00111 00111 0000000000000001     # SUBI R7, R7, #1
110011 00111 00000 0000000000000101     # BZ R7, #5
000010 00111 00111 0000000000000001     # SUBI R7, R7, #1
110011 00111 00000 0000000000000100     # BZ R7, #4
000000 00001 00001 00100 000000 0 0001  # ADD R4, R4, R1
110100 00000000000000000000000010       # BR #2
000000 00100 00001 00100 000000 0 0010  # SUB R4, R4, R1
010001 00000 00111 0000000000000100     # MOVE R7, R4
000100 00111 00111 0000000000000001     # ANDI R7, R7, #1
001001 00111 00111 0000000000011111     # SLI R7, R7, #31
010001 00000 00110 0000000000000010     # MOVE R6, R2
000100 00110 00110 0000000000000001     # ANDI R6, R6, #1
001010 00010 00010 0000000000000001     # SRLI R2, R2, #1
000000 00010 00111 00010 000000 0 0101  # OR R2, R2, R7
001011 00100 00100 0000000000000001     # SRAI R4, R4, #1
000010 00011 00011 0000000000000001     # SUBI R3, R3, #1
110010 00011 00000 1111111111101001     # BPL R3, #-23
010001 00000 01111 0000000000000010     # MOVE R15, R2
011110 00000000000000000000000000       # HALT
